Nightstrike:

Nightstrike smirked and said "and just the strongest can surv=
ive... and MAximals aren't prove that they can do it"
  ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
  From: Megan Solmonson 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: W=
ednesday, May 16, 2001 12:51 AM
  Subject: Re: ARKNESS PRIME!!! DIE



  * =
Arkness Prime steadied herself, watching Megatron and noting, logging and 
=
  storing away every movement he made for future uses.
  Though she was sur=
prised that he had removed his cannon, watching eagerly to 
  see what tric=
ks this Deceptacon had up his armor-plates sleeve.
  So she observed as his=
 weapon of choice was presented, though impressed her 
  little.  Her mind =
had imaged greater weapons, a mega-blaster perhaps.  
  But...a ball and ch=
ain?  Though, she knew from small hints from the Matrix 
  pulsating inside=
 of her chest that this weapon must NOT be taken lightly.  
  No weapon fro=
m the Deceptacon leader Megatron must be assumed as weak.
  But since he ha=
d chosen his weapons, her sword would be her own.  Though, 
  not composed =
of energy it had Matrix ions flowing through it and would give 
  the same =
effect as if she had.
  Megatron had began to swing the mace, and so her ow=
n move was slow but still 
  made. She began to circle him, the sword at th=
e ready and her eyes always on 
  his body.
  Her systems would alert her o=
n any unusual movements, dinging in on an 
  attack.*

  " The new has alwa=
ys replaced the old, Megatron. As fate circles and 
  repeats."
